Index.donateText: Together, we can protect vulnerable wildlife, conserve vital habitats, and build a future where people live in harmony with nature. Give to Khomyn Tal National Park today and power our global conservation solutions. Your donation makes you a member a Partner in ConservationÂ

Footer.company1: 2024 Khomyn Talyn Takhi NGO. All rights reserved.

Subscribe.notify: We will notify you with news

Tourism.description: Watching Przewalski's horses in the vastness of the steppe and dunes, seeing Siberian ibex, Mongolian gazelles, Taiga antelopes and wolf tracks in the sand, admiring a steppe eagle in the sky: the protected reserve in the Seer Mountain,1400 kilometers west of Ulaanbaatar.
